name: Timed Escape
description:
The spaceship is under attack  by mutatated monsters and is controlled by a corrupted AI.

There is only one way to escape the ship but the gate is locked and you need to get the key to unlock the escape door. Becareful after getting the card because then Time is of the essence.

You need to be fast and strategic with your fights which you gonna pick along the way.

Good luck soldier

Credits

Artist: Sven Grädig https://zurioko.itch.io/
